ink.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a coloured liquid that you use for writing, printing, or drawing
ink.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: the black liquid in sea creatures such as octopuses and squid
ink.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to make a document, agreement etc official and legal by writing your signature on it
ink.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: The two companies have inked a deal.
ink.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: to sign an agreement, contract etc
ink.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: The two companies have inked a deal.
